column4: Another question...I am upgrading through terminal.....all these upgrades to breezy are like 400 MB, and I want to know whether these upgrades will aply themselves automatically or not. I used these instructions, via terminal: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/BreezyUpgradeNotes
Thank you, bur[n] er and Hobbsee
